message: How long-running are the processes?  I assume they will sometimes be killed off for various reasons - is there any way for them to be notified in advance of a likely kill-off, so they can sync stuff to storage?
These look very interesting indeed.  About to have a play
you don't get much warning of a kill - you get sent SIGTERM, then you have one second, then you get SIGKILL
we can probably increase that grace period to 5 or 10 seconds]
They'll run until the server they're on is restarted or killed (we restart each server once every few days for code updates at the moment)
